name: Axe for Designers
description:
Axe for Designers, A Shift Left Experiment


This is a FREE plugin.


We are trying to build an automation tool that helps designers to craft accessible designs and thus accessible products reducing the cost of accessibility implementations by moving our shift left approach to the design phase. This is an in-progress experiment but we welcome you to join us to explore and contribute to this success. Let us together make the world more accessible.


Plugin features


  • Auto Scan: Scan components and/or web page UIs for accessibility issues automatically. In the first version, we automated : Color Contrast, Text Spacing, Touch Target and Headings

        By Figma node structure, it can scan Frames, Groups, & AutoLayouts.

  • Color Contrast manual checker: This gives flexibility to the designer to select a text node and check for contrast.
  • Dashboard view: If you would like to save these reports and share further with your teams, login to our cloud and fetch the reports along with dashboard views, product documentation & other technical design accessibility related resources. Share report is a coming soon feature. Login to axed-demo.dequecloud.com with the same credentials you registered with.


We will be glad to have your feedback on this.
